Package DatabaseAdmin

Class Query

java.lang.Object
DatabaseAdmin.Query
public class Query extends Object
This is a sample light weight database application That can have multiple users and can have multiple tables and database for each user The scope of the login exists beyond the execution of the program as the authentication Information is stored in the log file present at - src/main/java/Assets/userAuth.txt landing page is where the entire application is bootstrapped at.
Since:
Feb 26, 2023

    • useQuery

      public void useQuery(String sqlCommand, String username)
      This is the use query for specifying the SQL terminal to use a particular Database This basically sets the read/write path for all the files
      Parameters:
      sqlCommand - the sql command
      username - the user name

      public List<String> sqlCommandRefactor(String sqlCommand)

      Returns:
      the list of all the decomposed strings
